sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>spear</radical> radical and the <kanji>spear</kanji> kanji are the same!
meaningInfo: Spears are spears. It makes sense!
readingMnemonic: You take this <kanji>spear</kanji> and stab it into a cow. "<reading>MOO</reading> (<ja>む</ja>)!" it cries. The cow bites the spear out of your hands and stabs you back. "MOO!" you scream.
readingInfo: How do you like it? Don't stab cows with spears, you monster.
